title.rendered: International Design Authority, Architectural Digest Selects Eldorado Stone

content.rendered: Architectural Digest, leading source of architectural and interior design inspiration, featured Eldorado Stone’s Marbella Artisan Fire Bowl on June 11th in an online slideshow titled “The 10 Best Fire Pits for Summer.” The magazine also posted the fire bowl on their Facebook page, with the post receiving more than 475 Shares and 2,679 Likes.
